description: Business Object Layer that builds off of Joe.Map, Joe.MapBack and Joe.Security. Inherit from Joe.Business.BusinessObject<TModel, TViewModel, TRepository> and have all you default CRUD methods implemented with Security validation via Joe.Security
releaseNotes:
1.0.3.2 Adding AllValuesAttribute to make get a list of AllValues for a DropDown Easy These are Considered part of the BO Mapping.

1.0.4.0 - Bug fixes

1.0.3.3 Fixing issue with StaticCreateBO Method.

1.0.3.4 Added Dynamic Filter Attribute To Apply Dynamic Filters based on Properties in the Parent ViewModel

1.0.3.8 Updating to support dynamic filters added Joe.Map

1.0.4.3  ReThrow Validation Exceptions so they may be caught and added to the model state in MVC applications

1.0.4.4 Fixing Bug with returning count for paging.

1.0.4.8 - Renaming BusinessObject to Repository. You will need to change your code to inherit from Joe.Business.BusinessObject to Joe.Business.Repository
summary: Business Object Layer that builds off of Joe.Map, Joe.MapBack and Joe.Security. Inherit from Joe.Business.BusinessObject<TModel, TViewModel, TRepository> and have all you default CRUD methods done.
title: Joe.Business
